name: Zykluspiel
description:
Whether it be Rokugan, Fuedal Japan, or another similar setting, Zykluspiel can keep your game focused in the narrative without getting in the way.

Too many RPGs in a Japan-esque setting try to mechanize all the aspects of court intrigue and samurai drama. No more! Zykluspiel aims to be a robust framework with minimal text and rules allowing the GM and their players to get to the best moments in a game—the times where the rules don't apply.
